description:
NCALayer software enables using digital signature of the National Certification Authority of the Republic of Kazakhstan in web applications and operating Java in browsers

NCALayer software enables using digital signature of the National Certification Authority of the Republic of Kazakhstan in web applications and operating Java in browsers. NCALayer capabilities might be extended by installation of additional modules provided by third-party developers.
Added a new signing certificate for the update file, all modules of the NCA RoK have been re-signed with a new code signing certificate.
